name: AI tactical rumble. Test subject
description:
AI tactical rumble. Test subject

Little browser tactical game versus strong and pretty sneaky AI. 

It is the prototype concept for my future turn-based RPG. My goal is cunning AI, which can be personalized with different generals and races in the fantasy world. Like fearless orcs, cunning goblins, stubborn dwarves, wise elves, perfect ancient cyborgs, etc. (it is just concept, so no any sounds here)

Beat strong AI in 3 levels:

  1. With advantage;
  2.  Without advantage; 
  3. With a disadvantage.

Subscribe/follow to me here or by the link in the game. It will be used rarely for my game releases.
